entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 before morning. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023
